item.title: Pedro Almodóvar Hands Legendary Producer Esther García Donostia Award as ’27 Nights’ Kicks Off 2025 San Sebastian Film Festival
item.description: García, who lifted her award to raucous applause inside San Sebastian’s Kursaal Center, is a long-time collaborator of the filmmaker’s and considered one of the most influential women in Spanish cinem

item.title: ‘Tilda Swinton – Ongoing’: Amsterdam Eye Exhibition Gets Colorful Teaser (Exclusive)
item.description: The exhibition showcases new and existing works by such collaborators and friends as Pedro Almodóvar, Luca Guadagnino, Joanna Hogg, Derek Jarman, Jim Jarmusch, and Apichatpong Weerasethakul.

item.title: ‘Tilda Swinton – Ongoing’: Amsterdam Eye Exhibition Gets Colorful Teaser (Exclusive)
item.description: The exhibition showcases new and existing works by such collaborators and friends as Pedro Almodóvar, Luca Guadagnino, Joanna Hogg, Derek Jarman, Jim Jarmusch, and Apichatpong Weerasethakul.

item.title: Carmen Maura on Her Legendary Career, Splitting With Almodóvar and Baring All in Her Venice Drama ‘Calle Málaga’
item.description: The Spanish screen icon looks back on a fearless, decades-long career — from breaking away from her conservative family to reshaping Spanish cinema: “I have nothing left to prove.”

item.title: Carmen Maura on Her Legendary Career, Splitting With Almodóvar and Baring All in Her Venice Drama ‘Calle Málaga’
item.description: The Spanish screen icon looks back on a fearless, decades-long career — from breaking away from her conservative family to reshaping Spanish cinema: “I have nothing left to prove.”
